issue.title: [Dev][CI] Create simple static site with current status of nightly builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16359](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16359). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With the stored nightly build status build a simple static site that can be hosted on github pages with a dashboard showing the current status of the nightly builds.
